title: Bug 124066: Insert chart is not translated into Chinese in the context menu
description: Bug 124066: In the context menu, the 'Insert Chart' option is not translated into Chinese.
OB: The 'Insert Chart' option in the context menu should be translated into Chinese.
EB: When right-clicking in the layout to bring up the context menu, the expected behavior is that the 'Insert Chart' option is translated into Chinese. However, the actual behavior is that the 'Insert Chart' option is not translated into Chinese.
SR: Please investigate and fix the issue causing the 'Insert Chart' option to not be translated into Chinese in the context menu.
